comment: Very kind and understanding! one of the best i've had yet.

This class was very clear, easy to understand, fun, and I really felt like I learned a lot. He was great at giving feedback and it gave me a lot of confidence. 10/10 would take another class taught by him.

Professor Suffridge was a huge help in this course. He's an attentive and engaging instructor who made the learning experience enjoyable. I'll definitely recommend him to others—he's an awesome teacher who truly cares about his students.

Mr. Suffridge was amazing. It kept a sense of fun and humor in the course. Whether it was via videos or certain comments in the announcements. I wish I wasn't going through such a hard time during the time of his class but if able I would love to take his class again.

Professor Suffridge is such a great professor! He is easy going, understanding of life's challenges and very responsive. The course content was organized and easy to follow. I would definitely take another course with him and recommend this course to others who haven't taken it!
Very engaging and encouraging professor. Gives clear direction with creative freedoms that makes for fun projects! Would recommend and take another class with him anytime!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Professor Suffridge was an excellent professor who genuinely cares for his students. He takes the time to respond to questions as well as give constructive feedback when needed. He encourages creativity and has a great sense of humor to ensure the course did not get boring.

BEST PROFESSOR EVER! If you have the chance to take a class with Dale, don't pass it up! Not only did we learn a ton, but we also had the chance to participate in fun, exciting, and hilarious classes. He is super knowledgeable about his profession and provides excellent feedback on projects. He's a great guy + awesome teacher :)

That is not my course code. I take his visual comm class at IU east. He is very engaged with students. Eager to help and inspire. Gets back to you very quickly when you have questions. He can turn a boring subject into something interesting. He mixes things up and has made this class so fun. If you want a great professor, I highly recommend him!
This professor is amazing! He clearly loves and cares for his students. The lectures are so fun and the assignments are even more enjoyable. I wish I could take all of his classes!
